Description
===========
  The Sprite sample demonstrates using a 3D engine for doing classic 2D sprite
  operations. It uses the D3DX helper classes.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Src\Sprite

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\D3dx\Bin

Programming Notes
=================
  The Sprite sample demonstrates using a 3D engine for doing classic 2D sprite
  operations. It animates rotation, render target and opacity.

  This sample was built using the D3DX utility framework.
